statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT schedule_date, departure_time FROM transportation_schedules WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE route LIKE '%City%';
SELECT id, route FROM transportation_schedules;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE arrival_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_type FROM transportation_schedules;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transportation_schedules;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE vehicle_type IN ('Car', 'Truck');
SELECT id, route FROM transportation_schedules ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, departure_time, arrival_time)) AS avg_duration FROM transportation_schedules;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE route = 'Airport Shuttle' AND departure_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT MAX(arrival_time) FROM transportation_schedules;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT id, route FROM transportation_schedules WHERE departure_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT route) FROM transportation_schedules;
SELECT MIN(departure_time) FROM transportation_schedules;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE route = 'Main Street';
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM transportation_schedules WHERE arrival_time < '15:00:00';
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, schedule_date, vehicle_type FROM transportation_schedules WHERE route='Route A'
SELECT id, schedule_date, route FROM transportation_schedules WHERE departure_time < '10:00:00'
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE arrival_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '18:00:00'
SELECT id, route FROM transportation_schedules WHERE departure_time > '15:00:00'
SELECT id, route FROM transportation_schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-12-25'
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE vehicle_type LIKE 'Bus%'
SELECT id, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedules WHERE route LIKE '%Express%'
SELECT id, schedule_date FROM transportation_schedules WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car'
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE route IN ('Route A', 'Route B')
SELECT id, route FROM transportation_schedules WHERE departure_time >= '12:00:00'
SELECT id, schedule_date, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedules WHERE route = 'Route C'
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE route LIKE '%Highway%'
SELECT id, schedule_date, route FROM transportation_schedules WHERE arrival_time < '14:00:00'
SELECT id, schedule_date, route FROM transportation_schedules WHERE route = 'Route D' AND departure_time < '08:00:00'
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE vehicle_type = 'Train'
SELECT id, route FROM transportation_schedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30'
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM transportation_schedules WHERE arrival_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedules WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus' AND departure_time > '10:00:00'
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE bus_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE train_id = 1;
SELECT bus_route, departure_time FROM buses;
SELECT train_route, arrival_time FROM trains;
SELECT bus_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses WHERE bus_route = 'Route A';
SELECT train_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE train_route = 'Route X';
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE departure_time < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE departure_time < '2022-10-01';
SELECT bus_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses WHERE departure_time > '2022-10-01' AND bus_route = 'Route B';
SELECT train_id, train_route, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE arrival_time > '2022-10-01' AND train_route = 'Route Y';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS bus_count FROM buses;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS train_count FROM trains;
SELECT AVG(bus_id) AS avg_bus_id FROM buses;
SELECT AVG(train_id) AS avg_train_id FROM trains;
SELECT DISTINCT bus_route FROM buses;
SELECT DISTINCT train_route FROM trains;
SELECT * FROM buses ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM trains ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT bus_id, bus_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses LIMIT 10;
SELECT train_id, train_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE bus_route = 'Route A' AND departure_time > '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
SELECT bus_id, bus_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses WHERE arrival_time < '2022-01-15 12:00:00';
SELECT bus_id, bus_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses WHERE bus_route LIKE '%Route%' AND departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 18:00:00';
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE train_route = 'Route B' AND departure_time > '2022-02-01 10:00:00';
SELECT train_id, train_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE arrival_time < '2022-02-15 15:00:00';
SELECT train_id, train_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE train_route LIKE '%Route%' AND departure_time BETWEEN '2022-02-01 10:00:00' AND '2022-02-28 20:00:00';
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE bus_id IN (SELECT bus_id FROM trains WHERE train_route = 'Route B');
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE train_id NOT IN (SELECT train_id FROM buses WHERE bus_route = 'Route A');
SELECT bus_id, bus_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses b INNER JOIN trains t ON b.bus_id = t.bus_id WHERE b.departure_time < t.departure_time;
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE bus_route IN (SELECT DISTINCT bus_route FROM trains WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01 08:00:00');
SELECT bus_id, bus_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses WHERE bus_id = (SELECT MAX(bus_id) FROM buses);
SELECT train_id, train_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE departure_time = (SELECT MIN(departure_time) FROM buses);
SELECT bus_id, COUNT(*) AS num_trains FROM trains GROUP BY bus_id HAVING num_trains > 1;
SELECT bus_route, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, departure_time, arrival_time)) AS avg_duration FROM buses GROUP BY bus_route;
SELECT bus_route, COUNT(*) AS num_buses FROM buses b LEFT JOIN trains t ON b.bus_id = t.bus_id GROUP BY bus_route HAVING num_buses = 0;
SELECT bus_id, bus_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses WHERE arrival_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP();
SELECT train_id, train_route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE MONTH(departure_time) = 3;
SELECT * FROM buses ORDER BY departure_time ASC, arrival_time DESC;
SELECT train_id, train_route, arrival_time, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, departure_time, arrival_time) AS duration FROM trains WHERE DATE(departure_time) BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT bus_route FROM buses WHERE YEAR(departure_time) = YEAR(CURDATE());
SELECT * FROM bus_schedule;
SELECT bus_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM bus_schedule;
SELECT destination FROM bus_schedule WHERE bus_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM train_schedule;
SELECT train_id, departure_time, arrival_time, platform FROM train_schedule WHERE train_id = 200;
SELECT destination FROM train_schedule WHERE train_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule;
SELECT flight_id, departure_time, arrival_time, airline FROM flight_schedule WHERE flight_id = 300;
SELECT destination, airline FROM flight_schedule WHERE flight_id = 300;
SELECT * FROM bus_schedule WHERE departure_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM train_schedule WHERE arrival_time < '09:00:00';
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 12:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM bus_schedule WHERE destination LIKE '%City';
SELECT * FROM train_schedule WHERE platform = 'A';
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE airline = 'Delta';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bus_schedule;
SELECT MAX(departure_time) FROM bus_schedule;
SELECT MIN(arrival_time) FROM train_schedule;
SELECT AVG(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(arrival_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(departure_time)) AS travel_time FROM bus_schedule;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS bus_count, AVG(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(arrival_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(departure_time)) AS avg_travel_time FROM bus_schedule;
SELECT * FROM bus_schedule
SELECT bus_id, departure_time, destination FROM bus_schedule WHERE arrival_time > '12:00:00'
SELECT destination, COUNT(*) as number_of_buses FROM bus_schedule GROUP BY destination HAVING number_of_buses > 1
SELECT * FROM train_schedule
SELECT train_id, departure_time, platform FROM train_schedule WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
SELECT destination, COUNT(*) as number_of_trains FROM train_schedule GROUP BY destination ORDER BY number_of_trains DESC
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule
SELECT flight_id, departure_time, airline FROM flight_schedule WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
SELECT destination, COUNT(*) as number_of_flights FROM flight_schedule GROUP BY destination HAVING number_of_flights > 1
SELECT bus_id, departure_time, arrival_time, destination FROM bus_schedule WHERE destination = 'New York' AND departure_time > '05:00:00' ORDER BY departure_time ASC
SELECT train_id, departure_time, arrival_time, platform FROM train_schedule WHERE platform != 'A' AND destination LIKE '%London%'
SELECT flight_id, departure_time, arrival_time, airline FROM flight_schedule WHERE arrival_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2023-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT bus_id, departure_time, destination FROM bus_schedule WHERE destination IN ('Paris', 'Rome') AND departure_time < '10:00:00'
SELECT train_id, departure_time, platform FROM train_schedule WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 18:00:00'
SELECT flight_id, departure_time, destination FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01 12:00:00' AND destination LIKE '%Asia%'
SELECT bus_id, departure_time, destination FROM bus_schedule WHERE departure_time > '15:00:00' OR arrival_time < '22:00:00'
SELECT train_id, departure_time, destination FROM train_schedule WHERE destination = 'Berlin' AND platform = 'B'
SELECT flight_id, arrival_time, destination FROM flight_schedule WHERE arrival_time < '2022-06-01 00:00:00'
SELECT bus_id, departure_time, destination FROM bus_schedule WHERE departure_time - arrival_time > INTERVAL 1 HOUR
SELECT train_id, departure_time, platform FROM train_schedule WHERE TIME(departure_time) > '15:00:00'
SELECT flight_id, arrival_time, airline FROM flight_schedule WHERE airline = 'AirlineX'
SELECT * FROM buses;
SELECT bus_id, bus_route FROM buses WHERE departure_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM trains;
SELECT train_id, train_route FROM trains WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT flight_id, flight_route FROM flights WHERE departure_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01' AND arrival_location = 'New York';
SELECT schedule_id, transportation_type, departure_location, arrival_location FROM transportation_schedule WHERE arrival_time < '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE bus_route = 'Route A';
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE train_route LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule WHERE departure_time < '2022-03-01' AND transportation_type = 'Flight';
SELECT schedule_id, transportation_type, departure_location, arrival_location FROM transportation_schedule WHERE arrival_time BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM buses ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM trains ORDER BY train_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE flight_route IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(schedule_id) FROM transportation_schedule;
SELECT DISTINCT transportation_type FROM transportation_schedule;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM buses WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(schedule_id) FROM transportation_schedule WHERE departure_time < '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM buses;
SELECT bus_id, bus_route FROM buses WHERE bus_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE train_route LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT train_id, train_route FROM trains WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 00:00:00';
SELECT flight_id, flight_route FROM flights WHERE departure_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule WHERE transportation_type = 'Bus';
SELECT schedule_id, arrival_location FROM transportation_schedule WHERE transportation_type = 'Train';
SELECT * FROM buses JOIN transportation_schedule ON buses.bus_id = transportation_schedule.schedule_id;
SELECT train_id, arrival_location FROM trains JOIN transportation_schedule ON trains.train_id = transportation_schedule.schedule_id;
SELECT * FROM flights JOIN transportation_schedule ON flights.flight_id = transportation_schedule.schedule_id;
SELECT * FROM buses UNION SELECT * FROM trains UNION SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule WHERE departure_location = 'City A' AND arrival_location = 'City B';
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule WHERE departure_location LIKE '%City%' OR arrival_location LIKE '%Town%';
SELECT MAX(departure_time) FROM buses;
SELECT MIN(departure_time) FROM trains;
SELECT AVG(departure_time) FROM flights;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transportation_schedule WHERE transportation_type = 'Bus';
SELECT transportation_type, COUNT(*) FROM transportation_schedule GROUP BY transportation_type;
SELECT * FROM buses ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM buses_schedule;
SELECT bus_id, route_name, departure_time FROM buses_schedule WHERE bus_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, arrival_time FROM buses_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bus_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses_schedule WHERE bus_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM trains_schedule;
SELECT train_id, route_name, arrival_time FROM trains_schedule WHERE arrival_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains_schedule WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT train_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains_schedule WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM flights_schedule;
SELECT flight_id, route_name, departure_time FROM flights_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-06-01';
SELECT route_name, arrival_time FROM flights_schedule WHERE arrival_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT flight_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights_schedule WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, transport_type FROM routes WHERE transport_type = 'Bus';
SELECT route_name FROM routes WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT route_id, route_name, transport_type FROM routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM transportation_companies;
SELECT company_id, company_name, country FROM transportation_companies WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT company_name FROM transportation_companies WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT company_id, company_name, country FROM transportation_companies WHERE country LIKE '%Europe%';
SELECT * FROM buses_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bus_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses_schedule WHERE route_name LIKE 'Bus Route%';
SELECT train_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains_schedule WHERE departure_time < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT flight_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights_schedule WHERE arrival_time BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-08-01';
SELECT route_name, transport_type FROM routes WHERE route_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM transportation_companies WHERE country = 'USA' AND company_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT bus_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses_schedule JOIN routes ON buses_schedule.route_name = routes.route_name WHERE routes.transport_type = 'Bus';
SELECT train_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains_schedule JOIN routes ON trains_schedule.route_name = routes.route_name WHERE routes.transport_type = 'Train';

SELECT flight_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time, company_name FROM flights_schedule JOIN transportation_companies ON flights_schedule.flight_id = transportation_companies.company_id WHERE country = 'UK';
SELECT * FROM buses_schedule UNION ALL SELECT * FROM trains_schedule UNION ALL SELECT * FROM flights_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-09-01';
SELECT bus_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses_schedule WHERE route_name IN (SELECT route_name FROM routes WHERE transport_type = 'Bus');
SELECT flight_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights_schedule WHERE flight_id IN (SELECT company_id FROM transportation_companies WHERE country = 'France');
SELECT route_name, COUNT(bus_id) AS total_buses FROM buses_schedule GROUP BY route_name HAVING total_buses > 5;

SELECT company_name, COUNT(flight_id) AS total_flights FROM flights_schedule JOIN transportation_companies ON flights_schedule.flight_id = transportation_companies.company_id GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_flights DESC;
SELECT route_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(arrival_time, departure_time)) AS avg_duration FROM flights_schedule GROUP BY route_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM routes;
SELECT MAX(arrival_time) AS latest_arrival FROM flights_schedule;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM transportation_companies ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM (SELECT * FROM buses_schedule UNION SELECT * FROM trains_schedule) AS combined_schedules WHERE arrival_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT transport_type, COUNT(route_id) AS total_routes FROM routes GROUP BY transport_type;
